segments.text: I have a sore throat and my chest hurts .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How long have you been like this ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think you've got the flu . There's a lot of it going around .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What do you think I ought to do ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Get this prescription filled and go straight to bed .
segments.speaker: S2
